pages.text: A $(item)Durable Crate$() can hold more items than its less durable counterpart.
A $(item)Durable Shelf$() can hold more items than its less durable counterpart.$(p)$(info) A $(item)Durable Shelf$() can be placed in either a forward or back position.
A $(item)Durable Stash$() can hold more items than its less durable counterpart.
